TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TraceSwitch extends System.Diagnostics.Switch

summary.span: 提供多级开关，用于控制跟踪和调试输出，而无需重新编译代码。

span.span: Provides a multilevel switch to control tracing and debug output without recompiling your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪开关可用于筛选出消息根据其重要性。You can use a trace switch to filter out messages based on their importance. 类提供了， ， ，和属性，以测试该开关的级别。The class provides the , , , and properties to test the level of the switch. 属性获取或设置开关的。The property gets or sets the switch's . 您可以将级别设通过应用程序配置文件，然后使用已配置的级别应用程序中。You can set the level of a through the application configuration file and then use the configured level in your application. 另外，可以创建中您的代码和集直接要检测特定的代码段的级别。Alternately, you can create a in your code and set the level directly to instrument a specific section of code. 若要配置，编辑应用程序。To configure a , edit the for your application. 在此文件中，可以添加或删除一个开关，设置开关的值，或清除所有交换机之前设置应用程序。In this file, you can add or remove a switch, set a switch's value, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 此配置节定义与设置为`mySwitch`，和设置为 1，对应的枚举值。This configuration section defines a with the set to `mySwitch`, and the set to 1, which corresponds to the enumeration value . > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，你可以使用文本指定开关值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true`有关或表示一个枚举值，如文本`Error`为。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . 行 `` 等于 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 在您的应用程序，可以通过创建使用已配置的交换机级别具有相同的名称，如下面的示例中所示：In your application, you can use the configured switch level by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following example: [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/remarks.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/remarks.vb#3)] 默认情况下，此开关属性使用配置文件中指定的值设置。By default, the switch property is set using the value specified in the configuration file. 如果构造函数不能在配置文件中，查找初始开关设置的新开关默认为。If the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the of the new switch defaults to . 必须启用跟踪或调试要使用交换机。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 下面的语法是特定的编译器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果使用除 C# 或 Visual Basic 编译器，请参阅您的编译器的文档。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要启用调试 C# 中，添加`/d:DEBUG`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时标志`#define DEBUG`到你的文件的顶部。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:DEBUG=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要启用 C# 中的跟踪，请添加`/d:TRACE`到编译器命令行编译代码，或添加时标志`#define TRACE`到你的文件的顶部。To enable tracing in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，添加`/d:TRACE=True`到编译器命令行的标志。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. > [!NOTE] > 这些调试和跟踪编译器开关时将不再需要使用中隔离的类。These debug and trace compiler switches are not required when using the class in isolation. 它们仅需要结合或有条件地编译的方法。They are only required in conjunction with or methods that are conditionally compiled. 检测应用程序的详细信息，请参阅和。For more information on instrumenting your application, see and . 有关配置和使用跟踪开关的详细信息，请参阅[跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)。For more information about configuring and using trace switches, see [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md). > [!NOTE] > 若要提高性能，可以使成员`static`在类中。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新并使用该开关确定是否要打印的错误消息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在类级别上创建交换机。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果将第一个错误消息属性设置为或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 但是，`MyMethod`不会写入第二条错误消息，如果是小于。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置的级别应用，编辑你的应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加一个开关并将其值设置、 删除开关，或清除所有交换机之前设置应用程序。In this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，你可以使用文本指定开关值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true`有关或表示一个枚举值，如文本`Error`为。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . 行 `` 等于 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 在您的应用程序，可以通过创建使用已配置的交换机级别具有相同的名称，如下面的示例中所示：In your application, you can use the configured switch level by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following example: [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/CS/remarks.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.TraceError Example/VB/remarks.vb#3)] 当构造函数不能在配置文件中，查找初始开关设置属性的新开关设置为。When the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to . 类提供了， ， ，并属性，以测试的开关。The class provides the , , , and properties to test the of the switch. 属性获取或设置开关的。The property gets or sets the switch's . > [!NOTE] > 若要提高性能，可以使成员`static`在类中。To improve performance, you can make members `static` in your class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新并使用该开关确定是否要打印的错误消息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在类级别上创建交换机。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果将第一个错误消息属性设置为或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 但是，`MyMethod`不会写入第二条错误消息，如果是小于。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`参数用于设置的值属性，`description`参数用于设置的值属性，并`defaultSwitchValue`参数是保存为字段，用于初始化上第一次引用的属性。The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property, and the `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is saved as a field and used to initialize the property on first reference. 请参阅构造函数的详细信息和代码示例。See the constructor for more information and a code example.

summary.span: 获取或设置跟踪级别，它将确定开关所允许的消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the trace level that determines the messages the switch allows.

value.span: 值之一，它指定开关所允许的消息的级别。

span.span: One of the values that that specifies the level of messages that are allowed by the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要设置的级别应用，编辑你的应用程序的名称对应的配置文件。To set the level of your , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加一个开关并将其值设置、 删除开关，或清除所有交换机之前设置应用程序。In this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 配置文件的格式应类似下面的示例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 2.0 版中，你可以使用文本指定开关值。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, you can use text to specify the value for a switch. 例如，`true`有关或表示一个枚举值，如文本`Error`为。For example, `true` for a or the text representing an enumeration value, such as `Error` for a . 行 `` 等于 ``。The line `` is equivalent to ``. 当构造函数不能在配置文件中，查找初始开关设置属性的新开关设置为。When the constructor cannot find initial switch settings in the configuration file, the property of the new switch is set to . 设置此属性可更新， ， ，和属性，以反映新值。Setting this property updates the , , , and properties to reflect the new value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新并使用该开关确定是否要打印的错误消息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to print error messages. 在类级别上创建交换机。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果将第一个错误消息属性设置为或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 但是，`MyMethod`不会写入第二条错误消息，如果是小于。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than . [!code-cpp[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceSwitch.Level Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TraceSwitch.Level Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSwitchSettingChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 更新并更正此开关的级别。

span.span: Updates and corrects the level for this switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用由.NET framework，以验证并更正配置文件通过初始化开关的值。The method is used by the .NET framework to validate and correct the value of a switch initialized via a configuration file. 到所有跟踪侦听器写入消息，如果在配置文件中指定的开关值不由枚举和开关设置为已定义的值。A message is written to all trace listeners if the switch value specified in the configuration file is not defined by the enumeration and the switch is set to a defined value. 如果你尝试在你的代码来设置属性和值不由枚举，引发异常。If you attempt in your code to set the property to a value that is not defined by the enumeration, an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnValueChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 将 属性设置为 属性的整数等效值。

span.span: Sets the property to the integer equivalent of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在内部调用此方法属性开关更改。This method is called internally when the property of the switch changes. 该方法可确保与开关的值相关的属性反映新值。The method ensures that the properties relating to the switch's value reflect the new value.

span.para: 若要重写此属性，将转换的字符串值属性设置为二进制文件，然后设置属性。
To override this property, convert the string value of the property to binary, and then set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用， ， ，和属性结合和类来发出与指定的重要性或更高版本的所有消息。You can use the , , , and properties in conjunction with the and classes to emit all messages with a specified importance or greater. 当属性设置为最高重要性， ，发出仅将错误处理消息。When the property is set to the highest importance, , , only error-handling messages are emitted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新并使用该开关确定是否发出错误消息。The following code example creates a new and uses the switch to determine whether to emit error messages. 在类级别上创建交换机。The switch is created at the class level. `MyMethod` 如果将第一个错误消息属性设置为或更高版本。`MyMethod` writes the first error message if the property is set to or higher. 但是，`MyMethod`不会写入第二条错误消息，如果是小于。However, `MyMethod` does not write the second error message if the is less than .
